testcase.name: to verify Login with Correct details
testcase.system-out: Given launch "chrome" browser...............................................passed Then launch url "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/".......................passed And verify page by "url" with "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/".........passed And verify page by "title" with "The Internet"..............................passed Then click on homepage link "Form Authentication"...........................passed And verify page by "url" with "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login"....passed Then enter the username "tomsmith" in username field........................passed And enter the password "SuperSecretPassword!" in password field.............passed Then click on Login button "Login"..........................................passed And verify page by "url" with "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/secure"...passed
